title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 521.8 - Revocation of license
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 521.8 - Revocation of license

State Regulations

In the event that the Appellate Division
determines that a person licensed as a legal consultant under this Part no
longer meets the requirements for licensing set forth in section
521.1
(a) (1)
or
section
521.1
(a)(3), or
the registration and reporting requirements established pursuant to section
521.4
(c) of this

Part, it shall revoke the license granted to such person
hereunder. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
521.8

Amended

New

York State Register July 12, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 28, eff. 7/12/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
